descriptions.app_description: Retrieve IT asset details from Google Sheets based on a Service Tag query.

key_features: Retrieve IT asset information from a Google Sheet using Telex queries.
Integrates with Google Sheets API for real-time asset lookups.
Supports detailed and summary response formats.
Secure authentication using service account credentials.

settings.label: Google Sheets Service Account Credentials
settings.description: Paste the JSON credentials for your Google Sheets service account.

settings.label: Sheet ID
settings.description: The Google Sheet ID containing asset data.

settings.label: Sheet Name
settings.description: The name of the sheet (worksheet) containing asset data.

settings.label: Asset Lookup Column
settings.description: Column name where asset queries should be matched.
